00054 typedef struct classBitMap
00055   {
00056    unsigned short maxid;
00057    char map[1];
00058   } CLASS_BITMAP;
00059 
00060 #define ClassBitMapSize(bmp) ((sizeof(CLASS_BITMAP) + \
00061                                      (sizeof(char) * (bmp->maxid / BITS_PER_BYTE))))
